item.description: * this post is apart of a workshop i hosted for Starhacks ğŸ’« * Discord is a powerful messaging platform with great chat capabilities originally built to serve gaming communities. it has grown to a massive popularity and offers a lot of customization and autonomy via bots, custom moderation tools and more, which Iâ€™ll show you how to work with! in this tutorial Iâ€™ll show you how to set up a fully customizable Discord bot that can be running on your server in under 15 minutes.

item.title: Huztle, a Gen-Z podcast
item.description: Huztle Art background after a number of setbacks and weeks of waiting, i have finally launched my (first?) podcast! They share their experiences, the lessons theyâ€™ve learned and their own visions for the future in their respective fieldsâ€.

item.title: whoami?
item.description: the blogger hi i’m Rachel! im a computer science student interested in web development, games and ar/vr. right now i am currently studying at NYU, and this summer i will be interning @twitter. i made this blog to document some non-programming topics in my head. im not sure what else to say here so maybe ill update it more in the future :P call me beep me, if you wanna reach me ğŸ˜— twitter - @therachelplan github - rachelombok email - rachel.
